item slots [slots]: 2 misc

summoned with #846 Call Abomination (Conjuration 9)

The Abomination is a huge, slug-like beast with powerful tentacles. The very touch of these tentacles drains the life from those they strike. The Abomination has one great eye. The gaze of the eye will shred the minds of lesser beings.
